title: Track Awesome React Updates Daily
_seo_title: Track Awesome React (enaqx/awesome-react) Updates Daily - Track Awesome List
description: A collection of awesome things regarding React ecosystem

items.title: Awesome React Updates on Sep 23, 2024
items.content_text:
### React Component Libraries

*   [mantine (⭐29k)](https://github.com/mantinedev/mantine) - Fully featured React components library
*   [react-email (⭐16k)](https://github.com/resend/react-email) - Unstyled components for creating beautiful emails

### React Charts

*   [xyflow (⭐31k)](https://github.com/xyflow/xyflow) - A customizable React component for building node-based editors and interactive diagrams

### React Graphics and Animations

*   [simple-parallax-js (⭐2k)](https://github.com/geosigno/simpleParallax.js) - The easiest way to get a parallax effect with React and JavaScript
items.content_html:
React Component Libraries

  • mantine (⭐29k) - Fully featured React components library
  • react-email (⭐16k) - Unstyled components for creating beautiful emails

React Charts

  • xyflow (⭐31k) - A customizable React component for building node-based editors and interactive diagrams

React Graphics and Animations

  • simple-parallax-js (⭐2k) - The easiest way to get a parallax effect with React and JavaScript

items.title: Awesome React Updates on Apr 10, 2024
items.content_text:
### React Development Tools

*   [create-react-app (⭐103k)](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app) - Set up a modern Web app by running one command
*   [vite (⭐74k)](https://github.com/vitejs/vite) - Next Generation Frontend Tooling
*   [parcel (⭐44k)](https://github.com/parcel-bundler/parcel) - The zero configuration build tool for the web
*   [million (⭐17k)](https://github.com/aidenybai/million) - An extremely fast and lightweight optimizing compiler
*   [reactotron (⭐15k)](https://github.com/skellock/reactotron) - A desktop app for inspecting your React and React Native projects
*   [eslint-plugin-react (⭐9.2k)](https://github.com/yannickcr/eslint-plugin-react) - React specific linting rules for ESLint
*   [why-did-you-render (⭐12k)](https://github.com/welldone-software/why-did-you-render) - Monkey patches React to notify you about avoidable re-renders

### React Components Sandboxes

*   [bit (⭐18k)](https://github.com/teambit/bit) - A build system for development of composable software

### React Real Apps

*   [wave (⭐11k)](https://github.com/wavetermdev/waveterm) - An open-source, cross-platform terminal for seamless workflows
items.content_html:

  • create-react-app (⭐103k) - Set up a modern Web app by running one command
  • vite (⭐74k) - Next Generation Frontend Tooling
  • parcel (⭐44k) - The zero configuration build tool for the web
  • million (⭐17k) - An extremely fast and lightweight optimizing compiler
  • reactotron (⭐15k) - A desktop app for inspecting your React and React Native projects
  • eslint-plugin-react (⭐9.2k) - React specific linting rules for ESLint
  • why-did-you-render (⭐12k) - Monkey patches React to notify you about avoidable re-renders

React Real Apps

items.title: Awesome React Updates on Apr 26, 2023
items.content_text:
### React General Resources

*   [React Conferences](https://react.dev/community/conferences)
*   [React CodeSandbox Playground](https://codesandbox.io/s/new)

### React State Management and Data Fetching

*   [immer (⭐28k)](https://github.com/immerjs/immer) - Create the next immutable state by mutating the current one
*   [immutable-js (⭐33k)](https://github.com/immutable-js/immutable-js) - Immutable persistent data collections for Javascript
*   [rxdb (⭐22k)](https://github.com/pubkey/rxdb) - A fast, offline-first, reactive database for JavaScript Applications

### React Maps

*   [react-map-gl (⭐8.2k)](https://github.com/visgl/react-map-gl) - React friendly API wrapper around MapboxGL JS
*   [react-leaflet (⭐5.4k)](https://github.com/PaulLeCam/react-leaflet) - React components for Leaflet maps

### React Charts

*   [recharts (⭐26k)](https://github.com/recharts/recharts) - Redefined chart library built with React and D3
*   [visx (⭐20k)](https://github.com/airbnb/visx) - Visualization components
*   [victory (⭐11k)](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/victory) - A collection of composable React components for building interactive data visualizations
*   [react-vis (⭐8.8k)](https://github.com/uber/react-vis) - Data Visualization Components
*   [nivo (⭐14k)](https://github.com/plouc/nivo) - Provides a rich set of data visualization components built on top of the D3 and React libraries

### React Renderers

*   [react-three-fiber (⭐29k)](https://github.com/pmndrs/react-three-fiber) - A React renderer for Three.js
*   [ink (⭐30k)](https://github.com/vadimdemedes/ink) - React for interactive command-line apps
*   [remotion (⭐23k)](https://github.com/remotion-dev/remotion) - Make videos programmatically with React
*   [react-pdf (⭐16k)](https://github.com/diegomura/react-pdf) - Create PDF files using React
*   [react-figma (⭐2.6k)](https://github.com/react-figma/react-figma) - A React renderer for Figma

### React Native General Resources

*   [Expo Snack Playground](https://snack.expo.dev/)

### React Native Navigation

*   [react-navigation (⭐24k)](https://github.com/react-navigation/react-navigation) - Routing and navigation for your React Native apps

### React Native Awesome Components

*   [react-native-vector-icons (⭐18k)](https://github.com/oblador/react-native-vector-icons) - Customizable Icons for React Native

### React Native Libraries

*   [realm-js (⭐5.9k)](https://github.com/realm/realm-js) - A mobile database: an alternative to SQLite & key-value stores
*   [react-native-device-info (⭐6.6k)](https://github.com/react-native-device-info/react-native-device-info) - Device Information for React Native iOS and Android
items.content_html:

  • React CodeSandbox Playground

  • visx (⭐20k) - Visualization components

  • react-vis (⭐8.8k) - Data Visualization Components

  • react-three-fiber (⭐29k) - A React renderer for Three.js

items.title: Awesome React Updates on Apr 25, 2023
items.content_text:
### React State Management and Data Fetching

*   [redux (⭐61k)](https://github.com/reduxjs/redux) - Predictable State Container for JavaScript Apps
*   [mobx (⭐28k)](https://github.com/mobxjs/mobx) - Simple, scalable state management
*   [zustand (⭐53k)](https://github.com/pmndrs/zustand) - Bear necessities for state management in React
*   [tanstack-query (⭐46k)](https://github.com/TanStack/query) - Powerful asynchronous state management
*   [swr (⭐32k)](https://github.com/vercel/swr) - React Hooks for Data Fetching
*   [apollo-client (⭐20k)](https://github.com/apollographql/apollo-client) - A fully-featured, production ready caching GraphQL client
*   [relay (⭐19k)](https://github.com/facebook/relay) - A framework for building data-driven React applications
*   [jotai (⭐20k)](https://github.com/pmndrs/jotai) - Primitive and flexible state management for React
*   [xstate (⭐28k)](https://github.com/statelyai/xstate) - State machines and statecharts for the modern web
*   [effector (⭐4.7k)](https://github.com/zerobias/effector) - Business logic with ease
items.content_html:
React State Management and Data Fetching

  • redux (⭐61k) - Predictable State Container for JavaScript Apps
  • mobx (⭐28k) - Simple, scalable state management
  • zustand (⭐53k) - Bear necessities for state management in React
  • tanstack-query (⭐46k) - Powerful asynchronous state management
  • swr (⭐32k) - React Hooks for Data Fetching
  • apollo-client (⭐20k) - A fully-featured, production ready caching GraphQL client
  • relay (⭐19k) - A framework for building data-driven React applications
  • jotai (⭐20k) - Primitive and flexible state management for React
  • xstate (⭐28k) - State machines and statecharts for the modern web
  • effector (⭐4.7k) - Business logic with ease

items.title: Awesome React Updates on Apr 21, 2023
items.content_text:
### React Styling

*   [styled-components (⭐41k)](https://github.com/styled-components/styled-components) - Visual primitives for the component age
*   [emotion (⭐18k)](https://github.com/emotion-js/emotion) - CSS-in-JS library designed for high performance style composition
*   [vanilla-extract (⭐10k)](https://github.com/seek-oss/vanilla-extract) - Zero-runtime Stylesheets-in-TypeScript

### React Routing

*   [react-router (⭐55k)](https://github.com/remix-run/react-router) - Declarative routing for React
*   [wouter (⭐7.3k)](https://github.com/molefrog/wouter) - A minimalist-friendly routing
*   [tanstack-router (⭐11k)](https://github.com/TanStack/router) - Type-safe router with built-in caching & URL state management

### React Libraries

*   [preact (⭐38k)](https://github.com/preactjs/preact) - Fast React alternative with the same modern API
*   [floating-ui (⭐31k)](https://github.com/floating-ui/floating-ui) - Toolkit to create floating elements
*   [loadable-components (⭐7.8k)](https://github.com/gregberge/loadable-components) - The recommended Code Splitting library for React
*   [react-uploady (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/rpldy/react-uploady) - Modern file-upload components & hooks for React
*   [downshift (⭐12k)](https://github.com/downshift-js/downshift) - React autocomplete, combobox or select dropdown components

### React Testing

*   [jest (⭐45k)](https://github.com/facebook/jest) - Delightful JavaScript Testing
*   [react-testing-library (⭐19k)](https://github.com/testing-library/react-testing-library) - Simple and complete React DOM testing utilities
*   [cypress (⭐49k)](https://github.com/cypress-io/cypress) - Fast, easy and reliable testing for anything that runs in a browser

### React Awesome Components

*   [Awesome React Components (⭐45k)](https://github.com/brillout/awesome-react-components)
*   [react-big-calendar (⭐8.4k)](https://github.com/jquense/react-big-calendar) - Calendar component
*   [react-datepicker (⭐8.3k)](https://github.com/Hacker0x01/react-datepicker/) - A simple and reusable datepicker component for React
*   [react-qrcode (⭐4.1k)](https://github.com/zpao/qrcode.react) - QR component for use with React
*   [react-icons (⭐12k)](https://github.com/react-icons/react-icons) - SVG React icons of popular icon packs
*   [react-complex-tree (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/lukasbach/react-complex-tree) - Unopinionated Accessible Tree
*   [react-insta-stories (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/mohitk05/react-insta-stories) - A React component for Instagram like stories
*   [swiper (⭐41k)](https://github.com/nolimits4web/swiper) - Most modern mobile touch slider
*   [keen-slider (⭐4.9k)](https://github.com/rcbyr/keen-slider) - The Touch slider carousel

### React Tables and Grids

*   [react-grid-layout (⭐21k)](https://github.com/react-grid-layout/react-grid-layout) - A draggable and resizable grid layout with responsive breakpoints
*   [tanstack-table (⭐27k)](https://github.com/TanStack/table) - Headless UI for building powerful tables & datagrids
*   [react-data-grid (⭐7.3k)](https://github.com/adazzle/react-data-grid) - Feature-rich and customizable data grid React component

### React Internationalization

*   [formatjs (⭐15k)](https://github.com/formatjs/formatjs) - Internationalize your web apps
*   [react-i18next (⭐9.6k)](https://github.com/i18next/react-i18next) - Internationalization for React done right

### React Graphics and Animations

*   [react-parallax-tilt (⭐1k)](https://github.com/mkosir/react-parallax-tilt) - Easily apply tilt hover effect on React components

### React Integration

*   [rescript-compiler (⭐7.1k)](https://github.com/rescript-lang/rescript-compiler) - A robustly typed language that compiles to efficient and human-readable JavaScript
*   [react-rails (⭐6.8k)](https://github.com/reactjs/react-rails) - Integrate React with Rails
*   [fulcro (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/fulcrologic/fulcro) - A library for development of web applications in clj/cljs

### React Real Apps

*   [mattermost-server (⭐33k)](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-server) - An open source platform for secure collaboration
*   [kibana (⭐21k)](https://github.com/elastic/kibana) - Your window into the Elastic Stack
*   [webamp (⭐11k)](https://github.com/captbaritone/webamp) - Winamp 2 reimplemented for the browser
*   [overreacted (⭐7.2k)](https://github.com/gaearon/overreacted.io) - Personal blog by Dan Abramov

  • rescript-compiler (⭐7.1k) - A robustly typed language that compiles to efficient and human-readable JavaScript

items.title: Awesome React Updates on Apr 20, 2023
items.content_text:
### React Frameworks

*   [next (⭐133k)](https://github.com/vercel/next.js) - The React Framework
*   [gatsby (⭐56k)](https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby) - Build modern websites with React
*   [refine (⭐32k)](https://github.com/refinedev/refine) - Build your React-based CRUD applications, without constraints

### React Awesome Components

*   [kbar (⭐5.1k)](https://github.com/timc1/kbar) - Fast, portable, and extensible cmd+k interface for your site
*   [tagify (⭐3.8k)](https://github.com/yairEO/tagify) - Lightweight, efficient Tags input component

### React Native General Resources

*   [React Native Official Website](https://reactnative.dev/)

*   [Expo](https://expo.dev/)

items.title: Awesome React Updates on Apr 19, 2023
items.content_text:
### React General Resources

*   [React Community](https://react.dev/community)

### React Tutorials

*   [React Official Tutorial](https://react.dev/learn)
*   [A simple, scalable, and powerful architecture for building production ready React applications (⭐32k)](https://github.com/alan2207/bulletproof-react)
*   [The Fullstack Tutorial for GraphQL (⭐8.7k)](https://github.com/howtographql/howtographql)

### React Frameworks

*   [react-admin (⭐26k)](https://github.com/marmelab/react-admin) - A frontend Framework for building B2B applications

### React Component Libraries

*   [ant-design (⭐95k)](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design) - An enterprise-class UI design language and React UI library
*   [framework7 (⭐18k)](https://github.com/framework7io/framework7) - Full featured HTML framework for building iOS & Android apps
*   [ariakit (⭐8.3k)](https://github.com/ariakit/ariakit) - Toolkit for building accessible web apps with React

### React Awesome Components

*   [cookie-consent-banner (⭐167)](https://github.com/porscheofficial/cookie-consent-banner) – The lightweight and flexible Cookie Consent Banner
*   [heart-switch (⭐449)](https://github.com/anatoliygatt/heart-switch) - A heart-shaped toggle switch component for React

### React Components Sandboxes

*   [storybook (⭐87k)](https://github.com/storybookjs/storybook) - Storybook is a frontend workshop for building UI components and pages in isolation
*   [react-styleguidist (⭐11k)](https://github.com/styleguidist/react-styleguidist) - Isolated React component development environment with a living style guide
*   [react-cosmos (⭐8.5k)](https://github.com/react-cosmos/react-cosmos) - Dev tool for creating reusable React components

### React Forms

*   [react-hook-form (⭐43k)](https://github.com/react-hook-form/react-hook-form) - React Hooks for form state management and validation
*   [vest (⭐2.6k)](https://github.com/ealush/vest) - Declarative validations framework

### React Graphics and Animations

*   [auto-animate (⭐13k)](https://github.com/formkit/auto-animate) - A zero-config, drop-in animation utility that adds smooth transitions
*   [react-tsparticles (⭐8.3k)](https://github.com/matteobruni/tsparticles) - Easily create highly customizable particles effects

items.title: Awesome React Updates on Apr 18, 2023
items.content_text:
### React Tutorials

*   [React Interview Questions & Answers (⭐42k)](https://github.com/sudheerj/reactjs-interview-questions)
*   [Design patterns and Component patterns for building powerful Web Apps](https://www.patterns.dev/)

### React Graphics and Animations
